mapper.select:
select data_id, report_name, report_desc, report_url, report_module, bak1, bak2, bak3, bak4, bak5, bak6, sys_flag, data_order, del_flag, create_date, create_user, create_user_disp, modify_date, modify_user, modify_user_disp from sys_report_stp where 1=1
and data_id like '%${dataId}%'
and report_name like '%${reportName}%'
and report_desc like '%${reportDesc}%'
and report_url like '%${reportUrl}%'
and report_module like '%${reportModule}%'
and bak1 like '%${bak1}%'
and bak2 like '%${bak2}%'
and bak3 like '%${bak3}%'
and bak4 like '%${bak4}%'
and bak5 like '%${bak5}%'
and bak6 like '%${bak6}%'
and sys_flag like '%${sysFlag}%'
and data_order like '%${dataOrder}%'
and del_flag like '%${delFlag}%'
and create_date like '%${createDate}%'
and create_user like '%${createUser}%'
and create_user_disp like '%${createUserDisp}%'
and modify_date like '%${modifyDate}%'
and modify_user like '%${modifyUser}%'
and modify_user_disp like '%${modifyUserDisp}%'
order by ${iSortCol} ${sSortDir_0}
